location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 6/4 of 1873 from Colonel Lewis Pelly to an undisclosed recipient

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of despatch No 184 P of 24 January 1873 which informs Pelly that following his conference with Sir Philip Francis he is requested to submit his views concerning the establishment of a Tribunal for the adjudication of cases in which British Subjects are Plaintiffs and Persians defendants.
